templates.title: Wordpress
templates.description: Wordpress setup with a MySQL database
templates.note: Deploys a Wordpress instance connected to a MySQL database.

env.name: MYSQL_DATABASE_PASSWORD
env.label: Database root password
env.description: Password used by the MySQL root user.

templates.title: nextcloud
templates.description: Nextcloud setup with a MySQL database
templates.note: Deploys a Wordpress instance connected to a MySQL database.

env.name: MYSQL_DATABASE_PASSWORD
env.label: Database root password
env.description: Password used by the MySQL root user.

env.name: NEXTCLOUD_ADMIN_PASSWORD
env.label: Nextcloud admin password
env.description: Password used by the Nextcloud admin user.

env.name: NEXTCLOUD_PATH
env.label: Nextcloud local path
env.description: Nextcloud local path where to save database and data files
